type: Legendary Creature – Human Soldier Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Ripple in Time[/i] – The first instant or sorcery spell you cast each turn has rebound.
[i]Cut Through Time[/i] – Whenever Marth, Butterfly Effect attacks, exile the top two cards of your library. Choose one of them. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.
[i]Butterfly Effect[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, draw a card.
